name: Tavern Mayhem 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Running a tavern is not easy when the patrons are spreading havoc! Play the waiter, serve clients and keep them happy, or play the chef and cook whacky dishes!

Platform : HTC Vive + Android Device
Engine : Unity 3D 
Number of players :2 

Producer : Nathan BARDIN
Game Art : Philippine BRIARD, Marion CHABROL-SUPT, Laëtitia RODRIGUEZ-LEFEVRE, Romain SOUBRIER
Game Design : Lucas MARTINEZ, Noélie PROST
Game Design & Programming : Etienne HECK
Game Programming: Tanguy MORVANT, Yann PULIGNY
Music & Sound Design : Simon LESCHIERA
